ygData.subject: Re: thinking about EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: They reduced the price of the game, you can get EQ for 9.99 now, as far as explaining it, well I m sure it has some similarities with AC (I have never played
ygData.messageBody:
They reduced the price of the game, you can get
EQ for 9.99 now, as far as explaining it, well I'm
sure it has some similarities with AC (I have never
played it). I suggest doing the tutorial to familiarize
yourself with traveling and commands. You should get first
month free (do they still do that?) so that should give
ya plenty of time to check it out. I play on the
E'ci server and have several chars, my main one is
Jonquil, look me up if that's the server you play on. I
have a bunch of chars in the lvl4-10 range. Have fun
in the land of Norrath!!
